Title: 37294 - # Ways to Take Control of Your Business’s Finances
Direction: 675 words. Create a list of 4-8 ways that a business owner could take control of their company’s finances. You can discuss things such as creating a stricter budget, hiring a financial consultant, or taking accounting more seriously. Talk about different pieces of software that are available for business budgeting and give tips on how to know it’s time to hire a professional. To include your target URL, you can mention using Sage One’s online accounting to help keep finances in order. Your target audience is small to mid-size business owners.
Anchor Text: online accounting branded variation (client name + keywords)
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: handle online accounting with Sage One

Title: 37298 - # Ways the Cloud Helps Simplify a Business Woman’s Life
Direction: 675 words. Create a list of 4-8 ways that using the cloud could help simply a business woman’s life. Go into detail about different kinds of software and apps on the cloud that could help them plan, organize and manage their workload. You can link to the target URL by mentioning how women who own businesses would benefit from using cloud accounting software. Your target audience is working women and women who own small to mid-size businesses.
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: manage your business finances online
